short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Roll20 Character Sheets to a Printable Format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a print button to the character sheet tab on Roll20. Will export the sheet to a blank page and from there the page can be printed or saved as a pdf. Works on most sheets but not guaranteed to work for every sheet.
